snippet: Although Jersey City’s office market has been struggling, a building that already offers backup generators and a fiber optic network has been attracting new tenants.
abstract: Hybrid data center and office building is attracting new tenants in Jersey City, NJ, despite a struggling office market for the area following Hurricane Sandy; building offers tenants backup generators, redundant power and an extensive fiber optic network; tenants are betting that the building will remain untouched should another storm hit.
lead_paragraph: Although Jersey City’s office market has been struggling, a building that already offers backup generators and a fiber optic network has been attracting new tenants.

headline.seo: An Office Tower in Jersey City Is Built to Beat Storms
headline.main: Equipped to Weather Big Storms, a Jersey City Tower Draws Tenants
headline.print_headline: Equipped to Weather Big Storms, a Jersey City Tower Draws Tenants
